hero_desc: For Piping and tank Fabrication  Powering progress for our partners
intro_desc: GBS are cooperation of experts and technicians from Egypt and Algeria whom worked on industrial services and consultancy for Middle east & Africa agencies . GBS applying Global Quality and Standards for : - Piping welding and design. - Tanks ,Platform fabrication. - Layout Design . - New production lines Installations. - Relocation for production lines. - Retrofits.
intro_heading: Global Expertise, Tailored Industrial Solutions for the Middle East & Africa
mission_one: To attain customer loyalty by setting Excellence levels in the provision of Scientific, executive and advisory services Thus upholding the highest standard and ethical level.
mission_two: Our mission is to empower the beverage industry by delivering world-class services, ensuring that every project, no matter the scale, is completed on time and with the highest level of precision.
